item.title: How do i add words at the top of my server
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Top of your client.java under your public class statement

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @bla@~@lre@Shatt3rscape3@bla@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@yel@Owner=@whi@Shatt3r", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

		writePlayers();

^ Under boolean process() ^
